EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Palo Alto
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Palo Alto.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Wednesday, June 15th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/paloalto]]>
Location Pivotal Palo Alto <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/paloalto]]> 3495 Deer Creek Road
Palo Alto, CA 94304 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3495+Deer+Creek+Rd,+Palo+Alto,+CA+94304/@37.3942969,-122.1501381,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x808fb075bbd49a7f:0x1e85e256254a28d7!8m2!3d37.3942927!4d-122.1479494]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
